item.title: Five ‘bear traps’ to look out for this bonus season – and four ways to lessen the blow
item.description: March is the peak month for bonuses, but it can lead to tax and pension issues. We look at four ways to protect your hard-earned money.

item.title: Saba pursues more closed-ended funds
item.description: Activist investor Saba Capital Management could move against more UK closed-ended funds. Some trusts are taking pre-emptive action.

item.title: Nationwide to cut interest rates on 37 savings accounts
item.description: Nationwide Building Society is slashing interest rates following the Bank of England’s decision to lower the base rate in December

item.title: MoneyWeek news quiz: Will you be caught by the 60% tax trap?
item.description: The self-assessment tax return deadline, the £100k tax trap and the UK economy all made headlines this week. Can you get full marks in MoneyWeek’s new...

item.title: Taiwan Semiconductor shares jump on AI outlook
item.description: TSMC, Nvidia’s key supplier, has beaten on earnings and poured cold water on talk of an AI bubble
